pros: Flexible schedule, great scheduling staff.  Lots of job opportunities for nursing. Good pay for a CNA.
cons: No guarantee of hours, even if you are full time. Spend all your free time attached to your phone hoping to pick up available hours. CNA's are invisible within the organization. Executive leadership will barely acknowledge you when you walk by them.
